content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10, app 5-D ยง 5-D.5 - Well Pumps and Components

State Regulations
(a) Well caps and seals shall be tightly secured to the well casing, watertight, vermin-proof, and provide venting as noted in this section. Split caps shall not be used. Well caps shall be lockable and secured with sturdy, weatherproof locks or otherwise secured to prevent tampering. Notes
